p.k: Drama, Mystery Italy (1968). Hrají: Silvana Mangano, Terence Stamp and Massimo Girotti. Režie: Pier Paolo Pasolini.
p.d: A strange visitor in a wealthy family. He seduces the maid, the son, the mother, the daughter and finally the father before leaving a few days after. After he's gone, none of them can continue living as they did. Who was that visitor ? Could he be God ?
